CBMF.JK.summary: PT Cahaya Bintang Medan Tbk, a furniture company, manufactures office and household appliances in Indonesia. It manufactures furniture with wood for household and office appliances, such as tables, chairs, benches, beds, cupboards, shelves, cabinets, and room dividers; furniture with rattan and or bamboo; and furniture with plastic materials comprising tables, chairs, and shelves. The company also processes furniture, such as restaurant decoration cart/food carts, supplementary materials for mattresses; spring mattress or filled/stuffed with other supplementary materials; and non-coated plastic/rubber mattresses. In addition, it trades in household furnishings; kitchen and cooking utensils; lights and fixtures; consumer electronics, such as radios, televisions, recorders, CD and DVD players, stereo equipment, and video game consoles; lighting equipment; porcelain tableware comprising glass, spoon, knife, and fork; wooden tools; woven goods; cork articles; wallpapers; and carpets, as well as retails furniture, such as tables, chairs, cabinets, beds, bookshelves, shoe racks, sideboards, mattresses, and pillows/bolsters. Further, the company offers coating, finishing, repair, and restoration services for home furnishings and equipment, office furniture, and self-standing furniture, as well as invests in other companies. PT Cahaya Bintang Medan Tbk was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Deli Serdang, Indonesia.

CINT.JK.summary: PT Chitose Internasional Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel furniture for offices, hotels, hospitals, home, schools, and public facilities primarily in Indonesia. It offers folding-chairs; folding chairs + memos; hotel-banquet and restaurant chairs and tables; working and meeting products, including office and meeting chairs, desks and tables, racks and storage products, and lobby space products, as well as office shelves; school education and hospital items; and accessories. The company markets its products through a network of distributors and agents. It also exports its products to Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Thailand, South Africa, Sri Lanka, Brunei, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Malaysia, Singapore, Japan, Germany, England, Egypt, the United States, South Korea, Australia, and New Zealand. The company was formerly known as PT Chitose Indonesia Manufacturing Limited and changed its name to PT Chitose Internasional Tbk in 2013. PT Chitose Internasional Tbk was founded in 1979 and is based in Cimahi, Indonesia. PT Chitose Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tritirta Inti Mandiri.

CSIS.JK.summary: PT Cahayasakti Investindo Sukses Tbk engages in the furniture trading and construction service businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through two segments, Construction Services and Furniture Project. The company is also involved in the wood working, handcraft, household, timber processing, general trading, distribution, agency and representative, and franchising businesses. In addition, it undertakes building and general works, including residential housing, industrial area, buildings, factories, roads, bridges, waterways, irrigation, excavation, retaining, electric installation, telephone, plumbing, gas, and other related works; and provides planning, implementation, and supervisory services. Further, the company develops and manages real estate properties; and rents spaces in stores. Additionally, it acts as a distributor, wholesaler, dealer, supplier, and commission house. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Cahayasakti Investindo Sukses Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Andalan Utama Bintara.

GEMA.JK.summary: PT Gema Grahasarana Tbk operates as an interior contractor and furniture manufacturer in Indonesia and internationally. It offers a range of products and services, such as interior fit-outs, furniture and panel manufacturing, mechanical and electrical installation, maintenance, and logistics. The company also manufactures and sells customized, modular, home and office, and hospitality furniture. In addition, the company is involved in trading laminated material interior and furniture; house, and office furniture and equipment; and interior and furniture components. It serves banking and financial institutions; oil, gas, and mining, as well as retail and hospitality industries; and multinational company and others. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Gema Grahasarana Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Virucci Indogriya Sarana.

KICI.JK.summary: PT Kedaung Indah Can Tbk manufactures and sells enamel-on-steel cookware and can/tin products in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Enamelware and Can. It offers various stock pots, steamer cooker sets, ovens, deep stock pot gradations, pasta cooker sets, deep stock pots, and stock pots with steamer; roasters comprising lasagna pans, oval roasters, and fry pans; cookware sets; and storage bowls, such as soup bowls, salad bowls, mixing bowl sets, deep bowl sets, basins, serving bowls, preparation bowl sets, and fancy bowl sets. The company also provides tableware products, including plates and colanders; tea kettles; and lunch carriers, trays, canister sets, cookie tins, kerosene stoves, mugs, and milk pans. In addition, the company provides metal printing services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia.

LFLO.JK.summary: PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk operates furniture, fixtures, and equipment showrooms in Indonesia, South East Asia, and the Asia Pacific. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

LMPI.JK.summary: PT Langgeng Makmur Industri Tbk manufactures and sells aluminum cookware, plastic houseware and others, and PVC pipes, fittings, and profiles in Indonesia. It offers plastic houseware products, such as bathroom, basket, children item, food container, household, industrial, kitchenware, storage, tableware, and other products under the Global Eagle brand name. The company also provides nonstick cookware and bakeware products, including diamante, smeraldo classic and nobel, rubina, zaffiro, and drago series products; aluminum kitchenware products comprising aldize, kettle, magic roaster, pot, rice boiler and cooker, rice container, food carrier, and other products under the Global Eagle brand name; and plastic woven bags. It exports its products to Asia, the Middle East, Africa, and Europe. The company was formerly known as PT Langgeng Makmur Plastic Industry Ltd. and changed its name to PT Langgeng Makmur Industri Tbk in July 1997. PT Langgeng Makmur Industri Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.

SOFA.JK.summary: PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk manufactures and sales furniture products for home in Indonesia. The company is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia with additional location in Selatan, Indonesia.

SPTO.JK.summary: PT Surya Pertiwi Tbk distributes bathroom and kitchen products. The company offers sanitary wares, porcelain, fittings, kitchen products, and household appliances. It also engages in the construction activities. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.

WOOD.JK.summary: PT Integra Indocabinet Tbk manufactures and sells wooden furniture and other wooden products in Indonesia. The company operates through Manufacturing, Forestry, and Trading segments. It offers indoor, reclaim wood, panel, set up, garden/outdoor, and industrial and natural fiber furniture; building components, door products, and solid and fingerjoint laminated boards; and furniture for hotel, apartment, and school projects. The company also holds forest concession rights. It exports its products to the United States, Asia, Australia, Africa, and Europe. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT Integra Indocabinet Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Integra Indo Lestari.
